website_summaries.verdict: A good buy in a cast iron skillet that is durable and a versatile size.
pros: Users appreciated the size of this pan that makes it versatile enough for a wide range of items
Consumers also praised the quality of the pan and felt it boosted the flavor of the food they prepared
cons: Although it comes pre-seasoned, some reported that it needed additional seasoning
A few also felt the finish was rougher than other models

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I researched cast irons for a couple of weeks prior and at the end of my search choose this one because of the reviews and price. When it came i was excited to use it. It was heavy but not too heavy and the perfect size. I eagerly fried my pork chops which came out perfect. I washed the pot, dried it and left it on my counter. I came back almost 2hours later and my heart fell. The skillet was filled with rust. The bottom and inside rim was covered in rust. This was the first time I used it now I have to return it.....very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is every bit as good as a Lodge at half the price
customer_reviews.text: I'll place 4 stars on this product. It is every bit as good as a Lodge at half the price. It also however has the same flaw in that the cooking surface is somewhat pebbled.....just like a Lodge. It was easy to rectify. I stripped off the entire cooking surface until it was shiny new again. Then did a few deep seasonings with olive oil (my personal favorite). Now it has a deep brown surface, and is totally non stick. Eggs, starch...doesn't matter. Easy to clean, and re-season every time with a light coating...200 degrees...20 minutes...that's it. Nothing else comes close to cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: Canis

customer_reviews.title: Cast me in!
customer_reviews.text: Supper! Nice product and the PDF was extremely valuable and helpful since this is our first cast iron. Thank you again!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Young

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Such and amazing skillet. I have used it everyday since purchasing it. I love the flavor it seems to add to all of the food I cook in it. It makes great quesadillas and is worth the small amount of extra work to keep it scraped and oiled. This is a top quality pan that I would recommend again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Akerman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, prepare to re-season though!
customer_reviews.text: Love the cast iron skillet, however it is HARDLY pre-seasoned. Definitely had to redo it when I received it. I bought two of these - one for myself, and one for my sister - and both of them needed to be seasoned properly. Overall a good buy
customer_reviews.author: LorettaFlowers

customer_reviews.title: Arrived seasoned enough to cook in
customer_reviews.text: This is my first cast iron skillet. The pan arrived seasoned well enough to cook in. It's quite heavy, so the small lifting handle is useful. I wish I had bought a silicone handle protector, but I just use an oven mitt so it's not a real problem. The 12" skillet is very roomy: I made a frittata large enough to be dinner for five, and today I made a *really* big cornbread. A smaller 10" pan might have been enough, but the larger one just means automatic leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: Wm. Enestvedt

customer_reviews.title: My Fresh Australian Kitchen Cast Iron Skillet is amazing! I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: My Fresh Australian Kitchen Cast Iron Skillet is amazing! I absolutely love it. The food I have cooked so far in this skillet, has amazing flavor. I have already used it a handful of times for shrimp, roast, steak, and chicken. It's also easy to clean. The size is perfect, not too small and not too big. The team at Fresh Australian Kitchen helped me register for the warranty and are very friendly and helpful. The company gives you step by step on how to make sure your skillet stays like new for years to come. I can't wait to do more business with them in the future! Sincerely, A happy Fresh Australian Kitchen customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Sisco

customer_reviews.title: On What Universe is this pan 12.5 inches ... see photo
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and haven't had a chance to use it. I'm very familiar with cast iron pans so I'm pretty sure that it will perform well, but it is advertised as a 12.5 inch pan and as the hot shows, it is actually about 11.75 inches in diameter. Misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Chakrin

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat the price for this skillet!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Large skillet. Came pre-seasoned ----- Man, does it sear a beautiful steak! LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great skillet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this skillet. So much that I ordered one to give to a family member for Christmas. The only thing I will change is the roughness inside the skillet. It is much smoother than a Lodge but still needs a little smoothing of the high points of the texture inside the skillet. I will smooth it only slightly so that it will take a seasoning better than a slick smooth skillet but enough to get a more level seasoning. The skillet is thinner walled than the heavy Lodge ones but still good quality. I really do like this skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Fishnlady

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, FANTASTIC price.
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 12" skillets for all the married grandchildren. Hearing bad things about the pans with stick-free coating/cancer. I googled how to season them (recommended treatment is 3-5 times at 500 degrees, with a thin coat of oil, PLEASE GOOGLE) Though they are "Pre-seasoned", I will coat/season all five of the skillets before I gift them. I bought the red, rubber, silicone, heat-resistant, slide-on handles, for each skillet. BONUS: Iron pans puts beneficial IRON in your food, rather than cancer-causing chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Grama

customer_reviews.title: so good. If definitely recommend it to others
customer_reviews.text: This skillet came ready to use, although I treated it a bit myself, as well. I've had it about two weeks and have used it several times...so far, so good. If definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: BabyCatchingNurse

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love this skillet! I was always intimidated by cast iron just because I didn’t know how to take proper care of one but it comes with instructions and is very easy to clean. I love being able to start cooking on the stove and easily switch to oven without using more dishes.
customer_reviews.author: james jones

customer_reviews.title: Skillet Switch
customer_reviews.text: Not what I ordered. Received a square, cast iron skillet with grill lines. Less than 12 inches. Came in a Fresh Australian Kitchen box but skillet does not have the stamp of brand as pictured on site. Needed immediately so had to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Josette M. Gioeli-Fiegl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cast iron frying pan that gets better with age
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable skillet (like ALL Cast Iron frying pans). It is heavy (as all C.I. frying pans are), It has a nice pouring spout (designed for right-handed people), it requires more care than some frying pans but for certain cooking - it is essential. It is nice to be able to go from cooktop to oven! A decent price for a fairly large frying pan.
customer_reviews.author: gbdusmc

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cast iron pan and the price can't be beat in my opinion. It has all the features I wanted, pour feature, nice handle size, lift handle, nice depth and comes seasoned. The con: The cooking surface is not as smooth as the more pricier pans. My remedy for this, I sanded it myself. Was very easy, a little oil and sand paper, I sanded it to my liking in about 15 minutes, reseasoned it and viola its perfect. For the price it was well worth a little tweaking.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping and at home!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this skillet to take camping, and ended up using it at home a lot too. I love how it cooks, and clean up is fairly easy. It’s my first cast iron, so I’m not sure how “non-stick” they are supposed to be, but this one isn’t really at all. Regardless, I really like cooking in it and would definitely buy another from the same company.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole King

customer_reviews.title: Do not believe the online description.
customer_reviews.text: This Aussie skillet is described as “pre-seasoned” but came with very detailed instructions on how to season it. Duh! Despite already owing 3 skillets, I followed their instructions, expecting great things like a super shiny skillet, but it resulted in a sticky skillet (from the excess oil) and a smoke filled kitchen. Better if I had just started cooking with it.
customer_reviews.author: carpediem

customer_reviews.title: I can see buying this brand again for future cast iron kitchenware needs in the future.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Used it several times already and there is definitely a difference from regular non stick and cast iron. The flavor is much better. Love this pan. Definitely recommend this pan. Extremely satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: Great pan at a great price. However, even though pan comes preseasoned, I would definitely recommend you take the time before your first use to season it again. Aside from that, this pan is excellent for the value you get. I use this almost everyday. And with proper care, this pan will certainly outlast me. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants a versatile, everyday pan that will handle all your cooking needs.
customer_reviews.author: R Ryan

customer_reviews.title: its a pan
customer_reviews.text: okay this said it came pretreated so i just used it, but heated up some coconut oil in it first but got a strange white line in it that dont go away. And of course everything sticks in this pan (as expected) so not complaining about that. but it dont seem like it was pre treated at all.
customer_reviews.author: kevin k.

customer_reviews.title: It's cast iron what more could you want
customer_reviews.text: Weight of a thousand suns but a great pan non the less
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite cooking tool
customer_reviews.text: I take care of this like it is my baby. After looking up how to take care of my cast iron. It has not rusted at all. Almost still looks brand new and I have had this for months. I have made so many delicious meals with it and it adds an extra flavor to my food that I have been missing.
customer_reviews.author: Saskya

customer_reviews.title: This skillet is so great! And the price is incredible
customer_reviews.text: This skillet is so great! And the price is incredible! It's perfect for cooking a steak and getting that nice crust on the outside, steakhouse stye!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Hastings

customer_reviews.title: great panfor the dollar; great for one pan meals
customer_reviews.text: awesome cook pan, a real good cook pan for a reasonable price. wonderful for campsite (one pan meals- also get about 6-8 good cut bacon strips)
customer_reviews.author: Will V

customer_reviews.title: It arrived beautifully packed with no issues
customer_reviews.text: It arrived beautifully packed with no issues. It's solid and has quite a heft to it, but thats what you need. I used it several times. I like even heat distribution, healthy cooking and versatile use (oven, cook top , grill) Although it says its preseason I seasoned it again . Make sure you bake it upside down.Super buy it will last me for years.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: so this Skillet is a great value for me
customer_reviews.text: For the price this appears to be a well made skillet, and it IS seasoned right out of the box. First meal required no scraping to clean. I don't mind the discipline associated with maintaining cast iron, so this Skillet is a great value for me... Took off one star because there is a cosmetic dimple in the cooking surface.
customer_reviews.author: owlclaw

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible buy I bought it for my son for his birthday and it feels cheap it looks cheap and it’s not heavy cast-iron
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Nava

customer_reviews.title: Proper care people.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t do reviews but this pan deserves it. all of the rust and bad reviews you see are user error. If you don’t dry and season any cast iron pan they will rust. Just YouTube it people, or read the one the sellers have provided. A wise man told me you should never have to question what will break first, the cast iron pan or some ones head. This pan is thick, heavy and the best for this price point. Proper care people.
customer_reviews.author: zachary steven davidson

customer_reviews.title: Iron skillets are the best
customer_reviews.text: It was the best skillet for me to buy. It makes all my cooking taste so good! I’m a good cook now!
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my daughter for camping and she uses all the time and loves the 2 handles.
customer_reviews.author: Cathe B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: We use this skillet all the time! I wasn’t sure about cast irons before we bought this. I thought clean up would be a pain, but it’s so easy. It’s a great size too
customer_reviews.author: Logan & Anna Shover

customer_reviews.title: Great skillet
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great skillet perfect for all cooking with the exception of eggs due to the fact that the bottom is not smooth and eggs get stuck to the small unevenness.
customer_reviews.author: Filiberto Carrasco

customer_reviews.title: My favorite piece of cookware
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this skillet!! It’s my favorite piece of cookware that I own and I’m so glad I purchased it. It’s amazing quality and I was impressed with how affordable it was for being so nice. Make sure you follow the correct ways to take care of your cast iron and it’ll stay in great shape forever!
customer_reviews.author: Evangeline Starchman

customer_reviews.title: Issues
customer_reviews.text: The pan is ok. The description stated that the pan was “pre-seasoned”, but I had to follow the instructions to season the pan. The pan also had a manufacturing defect near the handle, but it does not impair the utilization. Also, I could not complete the warranty as instructed because the website was not available.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I’m doing it wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a pain to cook with. Eggs stick even after treating it and spraying oil before cooking. But still works.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Decent skillet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good cast iron skillet, especially for the price. Will definitely have to season it yourself before using to really get the intended effect.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: It is heavy .
customer_reviews.text: use it all the time ,love cooking on the cast iron I cook everything from eggs to steak with ease and easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: carol schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Good pan
customer_reviews.text: It works good after a couple of seasonings. I can cook eggs without them sticking which is big for cast iron. My only complaint is that the bottom of mine is a little convex instead of flat or concave so any oil I put in it goes to the edges of the pan and away from what I am cooking unless I use a lot of oil. Would be a five star if it wasn’t for the defect but I use it everyday none the less
customer_reviews.author: chris reed

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: So worth the money! I’ve bought some junk ones in the past but this one is my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need pre season
customer_reviews.text: Pre season cast iron skillet that you had to pre season....after washing it .....make sure completely dry immediately or rust will start show immediately
customer_reviews.author: mike j

customer_reviews.title: It easily rusts
customer_reviews.text: This product is no good. It is rusting after my second use. I started to use this since we are staying at home and boy oh boy.
customer_reviews.author: SuperRuf

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not a good experience with this product.... not good at all unless you cook every day ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've  had this a while and I'm still happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a couple weeks. It works great. I made Johnny cakes in the oven. They were cooked perfect and they didn't stick. I'm on a southern cooking kick and this is my favorite skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Rooks

customer_reviews.title: Eggs and Bacon
customer_reviews.text: My first iron pan and also can be used as a weapon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The one I got is not actually the one shown in photo - it has the griddle or grill lines built into it, but I think it will work just as well and is same size.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob & Rachel Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great skillet but it is NOT pre-seasoned as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great skillet but it is NOT pre-seasoned as advertised. You will need to purchase flaxseed oil and place in oven during a cleaning cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great for bacon and eggs. Got rusty a few times until we learned how to properly clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not reckomend
customer_reviews.text: Was suppose to be ready to use. Suposibly not. I rebaked the pan like suggested and tried again. Same mess came out. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Glen R.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought for. A Christmas gift so haven’t used it, but it looked wonderful and family says they like it. Great purchase for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Heather P

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's heavy, so just be prepared. Make sure you follow the care instructions. Keep it clean and cared for and you will have this pan for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Julia B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality heavy duty pan
customer_reviews.text: I seasoned it right away based on what others said about "pre-seasoned" and it works great. A good solid heavy pan that is flat (others commented on pans that were rounded, this is not) and plenty big. I like it!!
customer_reviews.author: jibs123

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap made in china product, it looks like something you pick up at like dollar general or some place like that.Not impressed cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: Shabbypers

customer_reviews.title: Every house needs one of these pans.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing and I can't rave about it enough. Everything you cook in it tastes better! Just make sure you season it after ever use and don't wash it with soap. Hot water only. It will last you forever!
customer_reviews.author: Robert T.

customer_reviews.title: Great to use
customer_reviews.text: Great so far used it 3 times after first seasoning it good size just heavy which is expected make sure you get he handle holder !
customer_reviews.author: Brad Hersh

customer_reviews.title: WILL BUY MORE
customer_reviews.text: I seasoned this before I used it even though it’s “pre seasoned” and it is the perfect non stick pan! Superior quality and definitely comparable to lodge!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Longo

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: Has completely changed my mind set towards cooking...thanks to this thing i LOVE it.

customer_reviews.title: Good pan
customer_reviews.text: A nice skillet it says pre seasoned but it could use a round or two of seasoning before use

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet because it Hass to be seasoned for the directions that came with it which is in complete disagreement with the title which says preseason a bit disappointed that I have a bit of work to do before I get to use it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a wedding gift off of their wedding registry and they absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I thought but fits in the oven. The pouring "lips" are great and pour stuff without dripping everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: awesome skillet! you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have loved cooking with my new skillet! I went ahead and seasoned it myself after I took it out of the box, but it did not take long and was a piece of cake. The double handles are really useful when taking things from the stove and putting them in the oven and vice versa. I am very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Dupuis

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter-in-law. It's very well packaged and pre-seasoned. I hope she will love it.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Got as a Christmas gift for my grandparents and they love it!

customer_reviews.title: Great Cast Iron Skillet
customer_reviews.text: I've used the skillet for all of my cooking to test how easy it would be to clean, etc. It has been great. No issues just keep it seasoned if something starts to stick. Best use is searing steaks then finishing them in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Foster

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product and has been used a LOT in my ...
customer_reviews.text: How have I gone so long without one of these? This is a great product and has been used a LOT in my home. Based on reviews I did go ahead and go through the initial seasoning process which is clearly laid out on the manufacturer's website.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan S. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this pan. I've used it 3 times with good resiults.
customer_reviews.author: Constance E. Lee

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Still learning the proper ways to handle cast-iron. So far this has been great. The size is perfect for anything. Easy to clean, it heats and cooks very evenly, and it looks awesome.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy using my new cast iron pan!
customer_reviews.text: Great cast iron pan, it' big enough to cook two steaks in.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing like cooking with a cast iron skillet. This one is a good buy.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pan, pre seasoning leaves a lot to be desired, I suggest seasoning the pan before use.

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise very good.
customer_reviews.text: Don't let it stay wet. You must completely dry it off or it will get rusty. Otherwise very good.

customer_reviews.title: Great pan.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first cast iron pan. I love this product, it is definitely top quality.

customer_reviews.text: Why is my food sticking first use??? It says pre seasoned

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Needed to be seasoned even though it is a pre-seasoned skillet.

customer_reviews.title: New found love
customer_reviews.text: But seriously, where have you been all my life? Not joking, I cool EVERYTHING in this thing. Was just thinking today how I totally got my monies worth. Meals are somehow tastier, prepped much better and the family is satisfied- as am I.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Skillet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mom and one for myself, and we both love this skillet it is easy to use, easy to clean. Just perfect!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother for mothers day, she LOVES it!

customer_reviews.title: Great skillet
customer_reviews.text: Great skillet, comes pre-seasoned which is a plus. Gives steaks a nice crust!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Cirrone

customer_reviews.title: Preseasoned, but follow the included instructions for best results
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described and arrived on time. I washed it and seasoned it as instructed at 500 degrees in the oven for 1 hour. The next day I used it on my pellet grill to make cornbread. Came out perfect with no sticking, and easy clean up..
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: Nice for gift
customer_reviews.text: Quality pan, well packaged. It requires some maintenance for upkeep.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the fry pan is excellent, cooks great, really glad that i bought it. patsy roberson

customer_reviews.title: ... and reseason it myself because the preseason isn't very good. Otherwise
customer_reviews.text: I had to strip and reseason it myself because the preseason isn't very good. Otherwise, it's a great pan.

customer_reviews.text: The Skillet to use if you are big fan of pan seared steaks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific skillet that heats evenly, and cleans easily.

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain.

customer_reviews.text: I love this pan, Especially for my meats in the winter! It makes a really nice crust on the outside and really keeps in the juices!

customer_reviews.title: Arrived cracked, returned replaced it with a Lodge which was noticeably studier

customer_reviews.title: Great size and price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great skillet love the size at a great price

customer_reviews.text: I've found the perfect way to simplify my life with delicious one-pan dinners cooked up quickly and easily in my cast iron skillet.

customer_reviews.title: best skillet I have and amazing for steaks
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny , best skillet I have and amazing for steaks

customer_reviews.title: My most-used pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. The pre-seasoning has been no trouble to maintain. Get a chainmail scrubber.

customer_reviews.title: Not pre-seasoned!
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as a pre-seasoned skillet, but it was not seasoned at all. But they did include instructions on how to season it.

customer_reviews.title: But trying to season it better
customer_reviews.text: Did just what instructions said to do. Still turned rust in a small spot. But trying to season it better

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be smaller cooking area/not as sturdy than normal cast iron skillet because of the great price but it is really big and a great value! Arrived faster than promised too

customer_reviews.title: Would love another one!
customer_reviews.text: I love it and use it all the time. A staple in my kitchen, so much room to prepare large meals!

product_meta.title: Pre-Seasoned Cast Iron Skillet 12.5 Inch by Fresh Australian Kitchen. Oven Safe Cookware, Perfect Camping, Indoors and Outdoor Pan.
feature_bullets: PREMIUM PROFESSIONAL QUALITY; The cast iron in the Fresh Australian Kitchen skillet has unbeatable heat retention, meaning the heat is dispersed evenly across the entire surface of its thick base to ensure thorough and even cooking with no cool spots.
THE ‘USE IT ANYWHERE’ PAN; Bake, Sauté, Grill, Broil, Braise, Sear with your Skillet. Each Skillet is Ovenproof and Suitable to be Used on a BBQ Grill, Gas, Electric or most Induction Stoves.

TOUGH AND DURABLE; With care your skillet should last for generations. The Fresh Australian skillet comes pre-seasoned, but if it ever starts to show signs of ‘too much love’ just re-season it (instructions included) and it’ll be as good as new. A skillet re-seasoned, is a skillet reborn.
FOR THE HOME CHEF - Not only is a well-seasoned skillet non-stick, but with a handle on both sides, The Fresh Australian Kitchen Skillet doubles as a baking dish.
LIFETIME GUARANTEE – Fresh Australian Kitchen make products for A Healthy, Outdoors, Lifestyle… With the Security of a Lifetime Guarantee.
